qas.question: In what year was the Somali flag invented?
What was Mohammed Awale Liban by profession?
What is the star at the center of the Somali flag called?
How many points does the Star of Unity have?

context: The Somali flag is an ethnic flag conceived to represent ethnic Somalis. It was created in <a0_0>1954<a0_0/> by the Somali <a2_0>scholar<a2_0/> <a1_0>Mohammed Awale Liban<a1_0/>, after he had been selected by the labour trade union of the Trust Territory of Somalia to come up with a design. Upon independence in 1960, the flag was adopted as the national flag of the nascent Somali Republic. The <a4_0>five<a4_0/>-pointed <a3_0>Star of Unity<a3_0/> in the flag's center represents the Somali ethnic group inhabiting the five territories in Greater Somalia.
